alert.note: Alert for Chemung; Tioga (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 24 at 8:08PM EDT until July 24 at 9:00PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: The National Weather Service in Binghamton has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... East central Chemung County in central New York... Central Tioga County in central New York... * Until 900 PM EDT. * At 808 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Van Etten, or 10 miles north of Waverly, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Owego, Candor, Spencer, Van Etten, Lockwood, Jenksville, North Spencer, West Candor, Catatonk and West Newark. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
